children.value: Overview
Headquartered in Los Angeles, California, Right Balance provides top-tier technology talent for innovative companies in the US. We’re in the top 50 companies to watch in LA.
Role Overview

We are looking for a high-performing Sales Representative who will effectively move the best and brightest candidates through the pipeline and secure placements for our clients. Your main objectives will be:
Introduce vetted candidates to our clients for open positions
Consistently follow up with the clients and the candidates
Move timely throughout the hiring process
Prepare the candidates for client interviews
Negotiating offers details between clients and candidates
Closing deals and securing candidate placements
What’s in it for you
Work with open-minded US-based startup professionals
Career growth opportunities in a rapidly growing company
Work directly with executives making meaningful contributions
Work remotely in the comfort of your home or a shared co-working space
Join an international team
Being able to help real companies make a positive impact globally
Required Qualifications
5+ years of full-time experience in Sales
Advanced written and verbal level of English
Demonstrated determination to successfully close deals
Ability to work in the US time zone
High level of excitement and curiosity about technology
Exceptional negotiating and objection-handling skills
Obsession with tracking and improving performance numbers
Experience consistently updating CRM with the results of your work
Nice to haves
Proven track record of placing technology resources
Growth-stage startup experience
Deep familiarity with a typical software development cycle and general software architecture
Coding experience
Industry publications and/or presentations
Bachelor’s degree in business or related field
Frequently Asked Questions
What are your typical clients?

The majority of our clients are venture-backed startups at the growth stage. Usually, at this stage, the company already achieved a product-market fit and is looking to expand rapidly. That’s where we bring the best engineering practices, strong architecture, and the latest technologies to help companies scale. Most of our long-term full-time engagements last multiple years.
What’s your company size?
The Right Balance team is 60+ engineers going to 100+ by the end of the year.
What are your core values?
Client First: we only win when our clients win. We treat client challenges as our own.
Ownership: we embrace responsibility, taking on challenges, getting them to completion, and enjoying getting things done.
Quality: we’re passionate about achieving quality outcomes by applying meticulous attention to detail.
